Articles.Content:
I cover the hill in Kraken bate.

My derpy hill.

The krakens attack. I adopt one.

MY adorable Kraken. I'll call him squishy.

I use bug spray.

My kraken-safe hill.

I spend a heartrending last moment with my pet Kraken. You die of sadness.

My moon of Bop!

My spooky ghost forces the Kerbals to create a space station above Bop. They clone me a few times.

My space station.

Gravity happens.

My random lake in China.

You all seemed to forget about the hill, leaving it unclaimed.

My hill.
you got the wrong hill. my hill

Sniper introduces your and any guard's cranium with a .50 BGM.

My blood-spatterd hill.

There is no hill.

My four hills!

I take one hill.

My hill.

I deliver a super-awesome flying spinning rocket-assisted ninja-kick straight to mikeman's face. With that kind of awesome move, it is pretty clear that the hill is dethroned for me to take.

My hill.

Scotty beamed me up at the last moment and then I beamed down and used the element of surprise (I am a surprise bender) to take the hill.

My hill.
I am a armed person. I shot you. my dead surprise bender
I have more arms than you. My hill.

I nuke the hill.

My hill.

I use a giant (curved) mirror near the sun to cause a noteworthy firestorm over the entire earth for 2 hours.

My hill.
you burnt somones eyes out. my tom
what the heck. my gravity.

You forgot about the hill.

My hill.

I plant my flag on the hill.

My hill.

I paint my avatar on your flag.

My hill.

I put you in a box. I also put everything else on the hill into a box.

My hill.

Quantum nonsense happens.

My hill.

I plant my flag on the hill.

My-not-defended hill.
